section.instruction: Use a ??" Dutch Oven lined with foil.
Dissolve Yeast in warm water with 1 teaspoon of the Sugar and let sit until it foams.
Meanwhile, scald Milk and beat Eggs.
Combine all of the Dough ingredients and knead well for 5-10 minutes.
Let Dough rise until it doubles.
While Dough is rising, combine all of the Filling ingredients and mix well.
When Dough is done rising, punch it down, and roll out into a ½" thick rectangle.
Spread Filling evenly over the Dough.
Roll rectangle and slice into 1" disks. Arrange on foil at the bottom of Dutch Oven.
Let Rolls rise until doubled, then cook with medium heat mostly from above.
While cooking, combine Glaze ingredients and mix well.
When Rolls are golden brown, remove from Dutch Oven and cover with glaze.

Notes.note: "Scald Milk" means to heat it to a temperature just below boiling. (&≈; 180°)

Modifications.modification: These look especially appetizing when topped with Maraschino Cherries.
